title: HttpResponse

API > @angular/common > @angular/common/http

HttpResponselink

A full HTTP response, including a typed response body (which may be null if one was not returned).

See more...

class HttpResponse<T> extends HttpResponseBase { constructor(init: { body?: T; headers?: HttpHeaders; status?: number; statusText?: string; url?: string; } = {}) body: T | null type: HttpEventType.Response clone(update: { body?: any; headers?: HttpHeaders; status?: number; statusText?: string; url?: string; } = {}): HttpResponse<any> // inherited from common/http/HttpResponseBase constructor(init: { headers?: HttpHeaders; status?: number; statusText?: string; url?: string; }, defaultStatus: number = 200, defaultStatusText: string = 'OK') headers: HttpHeaders status: number statusText: string url: string | null ok: boolean type: HttpEventType.Response | HttpEventType.ResponseHeader }

HttpResponse is a HttpEvent available on the response event stream.
